trans-unit.source: Azure Plugin for Eclipse with Java (by Microsoft Open Technologies)
trans-unit.target: Azure Plugin for Eclipse with Java (by Microsoft Open Technologies)

trans-unit.source: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows Server 2008, or Windows Server 2012.
trans-unit.target: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows Server 2008, or Windows Server 2012.

trans-unit.source: In Eclipse, from the Help menu, select Install New Software.
trans-unit.target: In Eclipse, from the Help menu, select Install New Software.

trans-unit.source: Enter the site location and press Enter.
trans-unit.target: Enter the site location and press Enter.

trans-unit.source: Select the items to be installed and click Finish.
trans-unit.target: Select the items to be installed and click Finish.

trans-unit.source: This plugin uses the latest version of the Azure SDK. This can be downloaded using the Web Platform Installer (WebPI) at <html></html>. However, if you don't have it installed, when you create your first Azure deployment project, the Azure Plugin for Eclipse with Java (by Microsoft Open Technologies) will automatically install the appropriate version of the Azure SDK.
trans-unit.target: This plugin uses the latest version of the Azure SDK. This can be downloaded using the Web Platform Installer (WebPI) at <html></html>. However, if you don't have it installed, when you create your first Azure deployment project, the Azure Plugin for Eclipse with Java (by Microsoft Open Technologies) will automatically install the appropriate version of the Azure SDK.
